budget.note: Adjust based on your service pricing

job_category: note: Leave empty array [] to accept all categories
skills_required: note: At least one skill must match job requirements
exclude_keywords: note: Jobs containing these keywords will be rejected

proposals_required.note: Maximum number of existing proposals to accept

job_type: note: Can be fixed-price, hourly, or leave empty for all types

notes.usage: Load this file in filter_jobs.py to control which jobs get approved
notes.all_filters_must_pass: Jobs must pass ALL filters (AND logic) to be accepted
notes.scoring: Jobs are scored 0-100 based on fit, ranked by score in ClickUp
